XenotypeDef.label: Scorps
XenotypeDef.description: The Scops are xenos who are greatly adapted for desert life with a tough exoskeleton and stinger to protect them from predators. They are terrible cooks, and their digestion is more suited for raw foods.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: The Scorps are xenos who are greatly adapted for desert life with a tough exoskeleton and stinger to protect them from predators.

XenotypeDef.label: Buzzkind
XenotypeDef.description: The Buzzkind are bee-like xenos with wings and ugly insect eyes. They are fertile, typically friendly, and great farmers. Strong at range, but weak in melee combat and weak to fire.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: The Buzzkind are bee-like xenos with wings and ugly insect eyes. They are fertile, typically friendly, and great farmers.
